About

MY STORY

I had an intense fascination with software and games when I was younger. The fascinating worlds and features these digital creations presented had me interested all the time. My never-ending interest led me to want to solve the mysteries hidden behind the screen. I tended to lose hours diving into the intricate details of different programs, wondering how a few lines of code could create such amazing things. A lifelong curiosity and a fundamental drive to comprehend the inner workings of technology were planted by this early passion. As I got older, this curiosity eventually developed into a deep interest in web development, where I learned how to create my own virtual worlds and realize my creative ideas on the wide internet. This is it.

EDUCATION

Embarking on the journey of higher education, I pursued a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science in college, a decision that has shaped my intellectual landscape and equipped me with a robust foundation in the world of technology. After years of dedication and hard work, I proudly graduated in June 2023, marking the culmination of an enriching academic chapter. This educational voyage not only honed my technical skills but also fostered a deep understanding of the principles that underpin the digital world. Armed with this knowledge, I am now poised to apply my academic achievements to real-world challenges and contribute meaningfully to the dynamic field of computer science.

  1. Elementary: Don Jose Aguirre, Elementary School - (2007-2013)
  2. High School: aint Estanislao Kostka College INC- (20013-2017)
  3. College: Jose Rizal Memorial State University - (2019-2023)

Thesis: Automated Water Billing and Collection System using Machine Learning Digit Detection

The project's goal involves digit detection in images, and I've opted for a machine learning approach. After accumulating a substantial dataset comprised of images containing digits from water meters, I proceeded to the training phase. Leveraging the EfficientDNet architecture, which harnesses the power of Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), the model exhibited exceptional performance during training, demonstrating its effectiveness in learning and recognizing digit patterns.
